parameters.name: BizTypeList
parameters.description:
The market types in invoices.

>  By default, this parameter is left empty. If this parameter is left empty, all market types are queried.

parameters.name: EndAmount
parameters.description: The maximum amount to be queried.

parameters.name: EndBizTime
parameters.description: The latest time when an order is paid Specify the time in the yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: EndSearchTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query.

parameters.name: OutBizId
parameters.description: The ID of the external order.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: SortType
parameters.description:
The type of the sort. Valid values:

*   1: Sort invoices by ID in descending order.
*   2: Sort invoices by invoice type in descending order, and then sort invoices of the same type by ID in descending order.
*   3: Sort invoices by invoice type in ascending order, and then sort invoices of the same type by ID in descending order.

parameters.name: StartAmount
parameters.description: The minimum amount to be queried.

parameters.name: StartBizTime
parameters.description: The earliest time when an order is paid. Specify the time in the yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: StartSearchTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of orders to be queried. Valid values:

*   1: the orders in which the invoiceable amount is negative.
*   2: the orders in which the invoiceable amount is positive.
*   3: the orders in which the invoiceable amount is not 0.
*   4: the orders in which the amount that has been invoiced is greater than 0.

>  By default, this parameter is left empty. If this parameter is left empty, all orders are queried.
